trans-unit.source: Configuration policy reference | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Configuration policy reference | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Use the information in this topic to help you decide which Microsoft Intune policy you need to use to manage your devices.
trans-unit.target: Use the information in this topic to help you decide which Microsoft Intune policy you need to use to manage your devices.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Intune configuration policy reference
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Intune configuration policy reference

trans-unit.source: Use the information in this topic to help you decide which Microsoft Intune configuration policy you need to use to manage your devices.
trans-unit.target: Use the information in this topic to help you decide which Microsoft Intune configuration policy you need to use to manage your devices.

trans-unit.source: For more detailed information about how to use policies, see [Manage settings and features on your devices with Microsoft Intune Policies](manage-settings-and-features-on-your-devices-with-microsoft-intune-policies.md).
trans-unit.target: For more detailed information about how to use policies, see [Manage settings and features on your devices with Microsoft Intune Policies](manage-settings-and-features-on-your-devices-with-microsoft-intune-policies.md).

trans-unit.source: Android configuration policies
trans-unit.target: Android configuration policies

trans-unit.source: Policy name
trans-unit.target: Policy name

trans-unit.source: Use when you want to
trans-unit.target: Use when you want to

trans-unit.source: Custom Configuration (Android 4 and later, Samsung KNOX Standard 4.0 and later)
trans-unit.target: Custom Configuration (Android 4 and later, Samsung KNOX Standard 4.0 and later)

trans-unit.source: Deploy Open Mobile Alliance Uniform Resource Identifier (OMA-URI) settings, such as Wi-Fi settings that can be used to control device features.
trans-unit.target: Deploy Open Mobile Alliance Uniform Resource Identifier (OMA-URI) settings, such as Wi-Fi settings that can be used to control device features.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the setting that you need is not available in a configuration policy.
trans-unit.target: This is useful when the setting that you need is not available in a configuration policy.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Android policy settings in Microsoft Intune](android-policy-settings-in-microsoft-intune.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Android policy settings in Microsoft Intune](android-policy-settings-in-microsoft-intune.md).

trans-unit.source: Email Profile (Samsung KNOX Standard 4.0 and later)
trans-unit.target: Email Profile (Samsung KNOX Standard 4.0 and later)

trans-unit.source: Create, deploy, and monitor Exchange ActiveSync email settings on managed devices.
trans-unit.target: Create, deploy, and monitor Exchange ActiveSync email settings on managed devices.

trans-unit.source: This lets users access corporate email on their personal devices without any required setup on their part.
trans-unit.target: This lets users access corporate email on their personal devices without any required setup on their part.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Configure access to corporate email using email profiles with Microsoft Intune](configure-access-to-corporate-email-using-email-profiles-with-microsoft-intune.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Configure access to corporate email using email profiles with Microsoft Intune](configure-access-to-corporate-email-using-email-profiles-with-microsoft-intune.md).

trans-unit.source: General Configuration (Android 4 and later, Samsung KNOX Standard 4.0 and later)
trans-unit.target: General Configuration (Android 4 and later, Samsung KNOX Standard 4.0 and later)

trans-unit.source: Configure mobile device security and functional settings.
trans-unit.target: Configure mobile device security and functional settings.

trans-unit.source: Specify apps that are compliant or noncompliant, and report when they are used.
trans-unit.target: Specify apps that are compliant or noncompliant, and report when they are used.

trans-unit.source: Configure kiosk mode that locks devices to allow only certain features to work, for example, allow the device to run only one app, or disable the volume buttons.
trans-unit.target: Configure kiosk mode that locks devices to allow only certain features to work, for example, allow the device to run only one app, or disable the volume buttons.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Android policy settings in Microsoft Intune](android-policy-settings-in-microsoft-intune.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Android policy settings in Microsoft Intune](android-policy-settings-in-microsoft-intune.md).

trans-unit.source: PKCS #12 (.PFX) Certificate Profile (Android 4 and later)
trans-unit.target: PKCS #12 (.PFX) Certificate Profile (Android 4 and later)

trans-unit.source: Use this profile to create and deploy .PFX settings for device certificate requests.
trans-unit.target: Use this profile to create and deploy .PFX settings for device certificate requests.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Secure resource access with certificate profiles in Microsoft Intune](secure-resource-access-with-certificate-profiles.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Secure resource access with certificate profiles in Microsoft Intune](secure-resource-access-with-certificate-profiles.md).

trans-unit.source: SCEP Certificate Profile (Android 4 and later)
trans-unit.target: SCEP Certificate Profile (Android 4 and later)

trans-unit.source: Configure a Simple Certificate Enrollment Protocol certificate which can be used with a trusted mobile device certificate to authenticate mobile devices to allow them to access network resources such as those configured by Wi-Fi and VPN profiles.
trans-unit.target: Configure a Simple Certificate Enrollment Protocol certificate which can be used with a trusted mobile device certificate to authenticate mobile devices to allow them to access network resources such as those configured by Wi-Fi and VPN profiles.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Secure resource access with certificate profiles in Microsoft Intune](secure-resource-access-with-certificate-profiles.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Secure resource access with certificate profiles in Microsoft Intune](secure-resource-access-with-certificate-profiles.md).

trans-unit.source: Trusted Certificate Profile (Android 4 and later)
trans-unit.target: Trusted Certificate Profile (Android 4 and later)

trans-unit.source: Configure a trusted mobile device certificate which can be used to authenticate mobile devices to allow them to access network resources such as those configured by Wi-Fi and VPN profiles.
trans-unit.target: Configure a trusted mobile device certificate which can be used to authenticate mobile devices to allow them to access network resources such as those configured by Wi-Fi and VPN profiles.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Secure resource access with certificate profiles in Microsoft Intune](secure-resource-access-with-certificate-profiles.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Secure resource access with certificate profiles in Microsoft Intune](secure-resource-access-with-certificate-profiles.md).

trans-unit.source: VPN Profile (Android 4 and later)
trans-unit.target: VPN Profile (Android 4 and later)

trans-unit.source: Configure and deploy settings that give users secure access to your company network from their mobile device.
trans-unit.target: Configure and deploy settings that give users secure access to your company network from their mobile device.

trans-unit.source: By deploying these settings, you simplify connections for end-users to their work.
trans-unit.target: By deploying these settings, you simplify connections for end-users to their work.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [VPN connections in Microsoft Intune.md](vpn-connections-in-microsoft-intune.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [VPN connections in Microsoft Intune.md](vpn-connections-in-microsoft-intune.md).

trans-unit.source: Wi-Fi Profile (Android 4 and later)
trans-unit.target: Wi-Fi Profile (Android 4 and later)

trans-unit.source: Configure and deploy wireless network settings to users in your organization.
trans-unit.target: Configure and deploy wireless network settings to users in your organization.

trans-unit.source: By deploying these settings, you simplify connections for end-users to the wireless network.
trans-unit.target: By deploying these settings, you simplify connections for end-users to the wireless network.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Wi-Fi connections in Microsoft Intune](wi-fi-connections-in-microsoft-intune.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Wi-Fi connections in Microsoft Intune](wi-fi-connections-in-microsoft-intune.md).

trans-unit.target: Custom Configuration (iOS 8.0 and later)

trans-unit.target: Email Profile (iOS 8.0 and later)

trans-unit.source: This lets users access corporate email on their personal devices without any required setup on their part.

trans-unit.target: General Configuration (iOS 8.0 and later)

trans-unit.source: Configure mobile device security and functional settings.
trans-unit.target: Configure mobile device security and functional settings.

trans-unit.source: Specify apps that are compliant or noncompliant, and report when they are used.
trans-unit.target: Specify apps that are compliant or noncompliant, and report when they are used.

trans-unit.source: Configure kiosk mode that locks devices to allow only certain features to work, for example, allow the device to run only one app, or disable the volume buttons.
trans-unit.target: Configure kiosk mode that locks devices to allow only certain features to work, for example, allow the device to run only one app, or disable the volume buttons.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [iOS policy settings in Microsoft Intune](ios-policy-settings-in-microsoft-intune.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [iOS policy settings in Microsoft Intune](ios-policy-settings-in-microsoft-intune.md).

trans-unit.source: Mobile App Configuration Policy (iOS 8.0 and later)
trans-unit.target: Mobile App Configuration Policy (iOS 8.0 and later)

trans-unit.source: Use mobile app configuration policies to automatically supply settings that might be required when the user runs an iOS app.
trans-unit.target: Use mobile app configuration policies to automatically supply settings that might be required when the user runs an iOS app.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Configure iOS apps with mobile app configuration policies in Microsoft Intune](configure-ios-apps-with-mobile-app-configuration-policies-in-microsoft-intune.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Configure iOS apps with mobile app configuration policies in Microsoft Intune](configure-ios-apps-with-mobile-app-configuration-policies-in-microsoft-intune.md).

trans-unit.source: Mobile provisioning Profile Policy (iOS 8.0 and later)
trans-unit.target: Mobile provisioning Profile Policy (iOS 8.0 and later)

trans-unit.source: Apple iOS line-of-business mobile apps are built with a provisioning profile that's included and code signed with a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Apple iOS line-of-business mobile apps are built with a provisioning profile that's included and code signed with a certificate.

trans-unit.source: When the app is run on an iOS device, iOS confirms the integrity of the iOS app and enforces policies that the provisioning profile defines.
trans-unit.target: When the app is run on an iOS device, iOS confirms the integrity of the iOS app and enforces policies that the provisioning profile defines.

trans-unit.source: The enterprise signing certificate that you use to sign apps typically lasts for three years.
trans-unit.target: The enterprise signing certificate that you use to sign apps typically lasts for three years.

trans-unit.source: However, the provisioning profile expires after one year.
trans-unit.target: However, the provisioning profile expires after one year.

trans-unit.source: Use this policy to proactively deploy a new provisioning profile policy to devices that have apps that are near expiry while the certificate is still valid.
trans-unit.target: Use this policy to proactively deploy a new provisioning profile policy to devices that have apps that are near expiry while the certificate is still valid.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Use iOS mobile provisioning profile policies to prevent your apps from expiring](ios-mobile-app-provisioning-profiles.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Use iOS mobile provisioning profile policies to prevent your apps from expiring](ios-mobile-app-provisioning-profiles.md).

trans-unit.source: PKCS #12 (.PFX) Certificate Profile (iOS 8.0 and later)
trans-unit.target: PKCS #12 (.PFX) Certificate Profile (iOS 8.0 and later)

trans-unit.source: Use this profile to create and deploy .PFX settings for device certificate requests.
trans-unit.target: Use this profile to create and deploy .PFX settings for device certificate requests.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Secure resource access with certificate profiles in Microsoft Intune](secure-resource-access-with-certificate-profiles.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Secure resource access with certificate profiles in Microsoft Intune](secure-resource-access-with-certificate-profiles.md).

trans-unit.target: SCEP Certificate Profile (Windows Phone 8.1 and later)

trans-unit.source: Configure a Simple Certificate Enrollment Protocol certificate that can be used with a trusted mobile device certificate to authenticate mobile devices to allow them to access network resources such as those configured by Wi-Fi and VPN profiles.
trans-unit.target: Configure a Simple Certificate Enrollment Protocol certificate that can be used with a trusted mobile device certificate to authenticate mobile devices to allow them to access network resources such as those configured by Wi-Fi and VPN profiles.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Secure resource access with certificate profiles in Microsoft Intune](secure-resource-access-with-certificate-profiles.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Secure resource access with certificate profiles in Microsoft Intune](secure-resource-access-with-certificate-profiles.md).

trans-unit.target: VPN Profile (Windows Phone 8.1 and later)

trans-unit.source: Configure and deploy settings that give users secure access to your company network from their mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: Configure and deploy settings that give users secure access to your company network from their mobile devices.

trans-unit.source: By deploying these settings, you simplify connections for end-users to their work.
trans-unit.target: By deploying these settings, you simplify connections for end-users to their work.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [VPN connections in Microsoft Intune](vpn-connections-in-microsoft-intune.md).

trans-unit.target: Import and deploy Windows Wi-Fi configurations that you have previously exported to a file.

trans-unit.source: Windows Information Protection
trans-unit.target: Windows Information Protection

trans-unit.source: (formerly known as enterprise data protection)
trans-unit.target: (formerly known as enterprise data protection)

trans-unit.source: With the increase of employee-owned devices in the enterprise, theres also an increasing risk of accidental data leaks through apps and services, like email, social media, and the public cloud, which are outside of the enterprises control.
trans-unit.target: With the increase of employee-owned devices in the enterprise, theres also an increasing risk of accidental data leaks through apps and services, like email, social media, and the public cloud, which are outside of the enterprises control.

trans-unit.source: For example, an employee sends the latest engineering pictures from a personal email account, copies and pastes product info into a tweet, or saves an in-progress sales report to public cloud storage.
trans-unit.target: For example, an employee sends the latest engineering pictures from a personal email account, copies and pastes product info into a tweet, or saves an in-progress sales report to public cloud storage.

trans-unit.source: Windows Information Protection helps to protect against this potential data leakage without otherwise interfering with the employee experience.
trans-unit.target: Windows Information Protection helps to protect against this potential data leakage without otherwise interfering with the employee experience.

trans-unit.source: It also helps to protect enterprise apps and data against accidental data leaks on enterprise-owned devices and personal devices that employees bring to work without requiring changes to your environment or other apps.
trans-unit.target: It also helps to protect enterprise apps and data against accidental data leaks on enterprise-owned devices and personal devices that employees bring to work without requiring changes to your environment or other apps.

trans-unit.source: This Intune policy manages the list of apps protected by Windows Information Protection, enterprise network locations, protection level, and encryption settings.
trans-unit.target: This Intune policy manages the list of apps protected by Windows Information Protection, enterprise network locations, protection level, and encryption settings.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Protect your enterprise data using Windows Information Protection](https://technet.microsoft.com/itpro/windows/keep-secure/protect-enterprise-data-using-edp).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Protect your enterprise data using Windows Information Protection](https://technet.microsoft.com/itpro/windows/keep-secure/protect-enterprise-data-using-edp).

trans-unit.target: Managed Browser Policy (iOS 8.0 and later)

trans-unit.source: Specify the websites that users can and cannot access when they are using the managed browser app.
trans-unit.target: Specify the websites that users can and cannot access when they are using the managed browser app.

trans-unit.target: For details, see [Manage Internet access using managed browser policies with Microsoft Intune](manage-internet-access-using-managed-browser-policies.md).

trans-unit.source: Mobile Application Management (Android 4 and later)
trans-unit.target: Mobile Application Management (Android 4 and later)

trans-unit.source: Mobile Application Management Policy (iOS 8.0 and later)
trans-unit.target: Mobile Application Management Policy (iOS 8.0 and later)

trans-unit.source: Modify the functionality of apps that you deploy to help bring them into line with your company compliance and security policies.
trans-unit.target: Modify the functionality of apps that you deploy to help bring them into line with your company compliance and security policies.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can restrict cut, copy, and paste operations within a restricted app, or configure an app to open all web links inside the managed browser.
trans-unit.target: For example, you can restrict cut, copy, and paste operations within a restricted app, or configure an app to open all web links inside the managed browser.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Configure and deploy mobile application management policies in the Microsoft Intune console](configure-and-deploy-mobile-application-management-policies-in-the-microsoft-intune-console.md)
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Configure and deploy mobile application management policies in the Microsoft Intune console](configure-and-deploy-mobile-application-management-policies-in-the-microsoft-intune-console.md)

trans-unit.target: Configures settings for mobile devices (all platforms) including:

trans-unit.target: System

trans-unit.source: Email
trans-unit.target: Email

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Intune now features separate **configuration policies** for each device platform, and these policies contain the most up-to-date settings that you can use.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Intune now features separate **configuration policies** for each device platform, and these policies contain the most up-to-date settings that you can use.

trans-unit.source: You can continue to use the mobile device security policy and any existing deployments will still work, but you should plan to migrate to the new configuration policies as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: You can continue to use the mobile device security policy and any existing deployments will still work, but you should plan to migrate to the new configuration policies as soon as possible.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Mobile device security policy settings in Microsoft Intune](mobile-device-security-policy-settings-in-microsoft-intune.md).|
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Mobile device security policy settings in Microsoft Intune](mobile-device-security-policy-settings-in-microsoft-intune.md).|

trans-unit.target: Policy name

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Intune Agent Settings
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Intune Agent Settings

trans-unit.source: Configure the Intune PC client on computers, including settings for:
trans-unit.target: Configure the Intune PC client on computers, including settings for:

trans-unit.source: - Endpoint Protection
trans-unit.target: - Endpoint Protection

trans-unit.source: - Software updates
trans-unit.target: - Software updates

trans-unit.source: - Policy check schedule
trans-unit.target: - Policy check schedule

trans-unit.source: This type of policy can be deployed only to groups of devices.
trans-unit.target: This type of policy can be deployed only to groups of devices.

trans-unit.source: Intune clients download new and updated policy according to the **Update and application detection frequency** setting, which defaults to eight hours.
trans-unit.target: Intune clients download new and updated policy according to the **Update and application detection frequency** setting, which defaults to eight hours.

trans-unit.source: However, you can force a refresh of policy on computers at any time.
trans-unit.target: However, you can force a refresh of policy on computers at any time.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Keep Windows PCs up to date with software updates in Microsoft Intune](keep-windows-pcs-up-to-date-with-software-updates-in-microsoft-intune.md).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Keep Windows PCs up to date with software updates in Microsoft Intune](keep-windows-pcs-up-to-date-with-software-updates-in-microsoft-intune.md).
